data.text: “Lingʼuru e nyima, un pinje mag chula e dier nam!
“En ngʼa mosejiwo ngʼat maa yo wuok chiengʼ,
Olawogi matek nyaka e yore mane pok owuothoe
En ngʼa mosetimo kamano mochopo dwarone,
Pinje manie chula oseneno wachno mi luoro omakogi;
Kamoro konyo nyawadgi,
Kamano japecho jiwo jatheth,
“To in, yaye Israel jatichna,
ne agolou e tungʼ piny gi tungʼ piny,
Omiyo kik ibed maluor, nimar an kodi;
“Jogo duto mamon kodi
Ibiro manyo wasikigo
Nimar an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi
Kik ibed maluor, yaye Jakobo,
“Ne, abiro miyo ichal gi gir dino
Inipiedhgi to yamo nokegi
“Joma chandore kendo joma odhier manyo pi,
Abiro miyo aore mol kawuok kuonde motwo,
Abiro miyo yiend sida gi siala, gi ochwoga kod zeituni
mondo ji one kendo ongʼe,
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya,
Un nyisecheu manono,
kendo nyiswa anena ni angʼo mabiro timore,
To kata kamano ok unyal gimoro kendo gik mutimo onge tich;
“Asejiwo ngʼato mawuok nyandwat kendo obiro,
En ngʼa mane ofwenyo wachni nyaka aa chakruok, mondo wangʼe wachni
An ema ne akwongo nyiso Sayun kawachone ni,
Ne amanyo to ok aneno ngʼato,
Neuru, nyisechegi duto gin gik manono!
